subdisciplines.name: Digital Painting
subdisciplines.description: The creation of digital art using painting software or tablet input devices.

subdisciplines.name: Sound Art
subdisciplines.description: The use of sound as a medium for artistic expression through various forms such as installation, performance and composition.

subdisciplines.name: Virtual Reality Art
subdisciplines.description: The creation of immersive art experiences through the use of virtual reality technology.

subdisciplines.name: Interactive Art
subdisciplines.description: A form of art that involves audience participation, where the viewer becomes an active participant and co-creator of the work.
